artiste: Various Artists, Vasilii Kamenskii, Aleksei Kruchenykh, Kirill Zdanevich
medium: Book with eight collages (including cover, one with letterpress) and four lithographs (three with collage additions) with lithographed manuscript text
dimensions: composition and page (see child records): dimensions vary
credits: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation (Boris Kerdimun Archive)
